summary: ITEM 1. BUSINESS Item 1.— Business is an outline of our strategy and our businesses by SBU, including key financial drivers. Additional items that may have an impact on our businesses are discussed in Item 1A.— Risk Factors and Item 3.— Legal Proceedings . 7 | 2024 Annual Report Executive Summary Incorporated in 1981, AES is a global energy company accelerating the future of energy. Together with our many stakeholders, we are improving lives by delivering the greener, smarter energy solutions the world needs.
